span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 n. 漂亮的，吸引人的：pleasing and wholesome in appearance; attractive
【例】a comely young woman 年轻美丽的女人
【近】attractive, cute, fair, good-looking, gorgeous, handsome, lovely, pretty, ravishing, well-favored, seemly. stunning
【反】homely, ill-favored, ugly unattractive, unbeautiful, uncomely, uncute, unhandsome, unlovely, unpleasing, unpretty 不好看的

【记】 音：可美丽，可爱美丽；(朋友聚会，发现)come 来的(美眉)都是漂亮的，(再看看家里的)
homely 丑
